sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./WeatherStyle/style.css" import "./WeatherStyle/responsive.css" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { fetchWeather } from '../../store/weatherSlice' const Weather = () => { const weather = useSelector(state => state.weather.weather) const [searchState, setSearchState] = useState() const seach = (e) => { if (searchState) { dispatch(fetchWeather(searchState)) } else { return } } const searchBtn = () => { setSearchState('') } const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchWeather("London")) }, []) return (

{weather.location.name}

{weather.forecast.forecastday[0].date}

{weather.current.temp_f}°

{weather.current.condition.text}

{weather.current.wind_mph} mph

{weather.current.humidity} %

Good Time Of Day

{weather.current.temp_f}°

{weather.current.wind_mph} mph

{weather.current.humidity} %

Feels like {weather.current.feelslike_f}°

{weather.current.condition.text}

Hourly Forecast

{ weather.forecast.forecastday[0].hour.map((value, index) => { if (index < 6) { return (

{index + 1} {value.time > "12:00" ? "AM" : "PM"}

{value.temp_f}°

{value.condition.text}

) } }) }
) } export default Weather
